definition.de: Eine Zeremonie, auch bekannt als Beginn, bei der eine Person ein Diplom oder einen akademischen Grad erhält
definition.dk: En ceremoni, hvor en person modtager bevis for at have bestået en uddannelse.
definition.en-GB: A ceremony, also known as commencement, at which a person receives a diploma or academic degree
definition.en-US: A ceremony, also known as commencement, at which a person receives a diploma or academic degree
definition.pt-BR: Cerimônia na qual uma pessoa recebe um diploma ou grau acadêmico.
definition.pt-PT: Cerimónia na qual uma pessoa recebe um diploma ou grau académico.
definition.se: Nyheter om studenter och andra former av examen
definition.zh-Hans: 一个人获得文凭或学位的仪式，也称为毕业典礼
